H0.text: What was the name of the Brazilian player who won the Women’s Singles Finals at Wimbledon in 1959, 1960 and 1964. Angela Mortimer

H1.text: What was the name of the Brazilian player who won the Women’s Singles Finals at Wimbledon in 1959, 1960 and 1964. Christine Truman

H2.text: What was the name of the Brazilian player who won the Women’s Singles Finals at Wimbledon in 1959, 1960 and 1964. Darlene Hard

H3.text: What was the name of the Brazilian player who won the Women’s Singles Finals at Wimbledon in 1959, 1960 and 1964. Maria Bueno

A4.text: She won the singles title at Wimbledon three times and at the U.S. Championships four times.

A5.text: She was the first non-North-American woman to win both Wimbledon and the U.S. Championships in the same calendar year.
